Plot: This heartwarming classic tells the tale of a country boy who adopts a mischevious black lamb and learns valuable lessons about love and dedication.
Title: So Dear to My Heart
Writer: John Tucker Battle (screenplay), Maurice Rapf (adaptation), Ted Sears (adaptation), Sterling North (novel), Marc Davis (cartoon story treatment), Ken Anderson (cartoon story treatment), Bill Peet (cartoon story treatment)
Actors: Burl Ives, Beulah Bondi, Bobby Driscoll, Luana Patten
